name: Deep into the darkness
description:
The game is about a poor miner who fell down into a cave and must find his way back to the top. The inner of the cave is dark and full of really bad guys' snails!

Try to reach the exit of the cave before your lamp finishes the oil, otherwise, the monster of darkness gets you! You can collect more oil from lamps to refill your stocks!

This game is a simple prototype, based on its success, I may consider developing it further to a full-fledged game!
